MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD4 postcode area of Earlston. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:39pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and have identified damage to our underground cable network on Huntshaw Road.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:47pm on 13th April 2021
